Dreams

- by Langston Hughes (1902-1967)

Hold fast to dreams
For if dreams die
Life is a broken-winged bird
That cannot fly.

Hold fast to dreams
For when dreams go
Life is a barren field
Frozen with snow.

G'day, I'm Steven

I'm a SRE engineer based in Sydney, Australia. Passionate about technologies and delivering innovation that leads to impact. To me science is our magic that we can use to change the world, the power is on our hand to make it better not worse - "This world is but a canvas to our imagination!" - by Henry David Thoreau I have master degree of System Engneering and bachelar degress of Electronic and Information Engeering.
I'm:
➣ Certified Kubernetes Administrator
➣ Certified Openstack Administrator
➣ Certified VMware Certified Professional - Data Center Virtualization
➣ Certified Application Developer – IBM Cloud Platform
➣ Certified Solutions Specialist – IBM Rational Team Concert
➣ Certified IBM DB2 Administrator
